body.name: Broom and Dustpan Set - Heavy Duty Combo for Efficient Floor Cleaning, Upright Standing Design, Long Handle Broom for Home, Kitchen, and Outdoor Use (Beige)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 13 hrs 24 mins
features: Extendable Pole Design: Say goodbye to backaches from bending while sweeping. Our broom comes with an optional extension pole that adjusts the broom length from a comfortable 39.76 inches to an extended 51.18 inches, allowing you to choose the perfect height for your comfort. The long handle ensures you can stand upright while sweeping, making cleaning less of a chore and more of a breeze.

Heavy-Duty Broom Bristles: Experience the power of our four-row bristles design. Crafted from eco-friendly fibers made from recycled plastics, these dense and durable bristles ensure thorough and efficient sweeping of all surfaces. Hub City Industries is committed to not only keeping your spaces clean but also protecting our planet.

Easy Stand-Up Storage: Our thoughtfully designed broom and dustpan set features a clip-on mechanism that allows for upright storage, making it a perfect space-saving solution. Its compact design ensures your living or workspace remains uncluttered and tidy, ready for whatever life throws your way.

Self-Cleaning Dustpan Teeth: Cleaning the broom itself is as easy as sweeping! The built-in scraper and comb/teeth on the dustpan allow for effortless cleaning of the broom bristles. Whether it's pet hair or human hair, a single pull on the teeth will leave your broom clean and ready for its next use. Plus, the dustpan's rubber lip ensures it sits flush with the floor for maximum pickup.

Powerful After-Service: Your satisfaction is our top priority. Every purchase comes with a 30-day refund or replacement guarantee, no questions asked. Should you have any concerns, our dedicated customer service team is just a message away, ready to ensure your Hub City Industries experience is nothing short of exceptional.

Ideal For: Whether you're dealing with the daily shedding of your furry friends or just keeping your living spaces dust-free, our broom and dustpan set is up to the task. Its versatile design makes it suitable for both indoor and outdoor use, ensuring your surroundings are always spotless.

Elevate your cleaning game with the Hub City Industries Broom and Dustpan Set. It's not just a tool; it's a game-changer in how you maintain cleanliness in your environment. Add it to your cleaning arsenal today and experience the difference in cleanliness and convenience.
body.description: Introducing the Hub City Industries Broom and Dustpan Set, your ultimate solution for keeping your home, office, or outdoor space pristine. Designed with innovation and user convenience in mind, this set is not just a cleaning tool, it's an enhancement to your cleaning routine, offering unmatched efficiency and ease of use.
